createAttachment.description: Adds an attachment to a document.

props.name: source
props.description: URL link to the file to be attached to the document

props.name: name
props.description: Optional name to set for the uploaded file.

createDocumentFromTemplate.description: Creates a document from a PandaDoc Template.

props.name: name
props.description: Name the document you are creating

props.name: recipients
props.description: List of recipients to whom the document will be sent

props.name: email
props.description: Recipient email address

props.name: phone
props.description: Recipient phone number

props.name: signing_order
props.description: Set a signing order for recipient

props.name: tokens
props.description: Pass values for the variables in the template

props.name: tags
props.description: Tag the document for filtering and organization

props.name: metadata
props.description: Additional data in key-value format to associate with document

createOrUpdateContact.description: Creates a new or update an existing contact.

props.name: contact_id
props.description: Select a contact to update. Leave empty to create a new contact.

props.name: email
props.description: An email address of the contact

props.name: first_name
props.description: Contact\

props.name: last_name
props.description: Contact\

props.name: company
props.description: Contact\

props.name: phone
props.description: A phone number

props.name: street_address
props.description: A street address

props.name: city
props.description: A city name

props.name: postal_code
props.description: A postal code

props.name: separate_files
props.description: Download document bundle as a zip archive of separate PDFs (1 file per section)

props.name: watermark_color
props.description: Select a watermark color or use custom HEX code

props.name: custom_watermark_color
props.description: Enter a custom HEX color code (e.g., #FF5733). Only used if "Custom HEX Code" is selected above.

props.name: watermark_font_size
props.description: Font size of the watermark text

props.name: watermark_opacity
props.description: Opacity of the watermark (0.0 to 1.0)

props.name: q
props.description: Search documents by name or reference number

props.name: id
props.description: Search for document by its specific ID

props.name: status
props.description: Filter documents by status

props.name: status__ne
props.description: Exclude documents with this status

props.name: template_id
props.description: Filter by parent template (cannot be used with Form)

props.name: created_from
props.description: Include only documents created on or after this date

props.name: created_to
props.description: Include only documents created before this date

props.name: completed_from
props.description: Include only documents completed on or after this date

props.name: completed_to
props.description: Include only documents completed before this date

props.name: modified_from
props.description: Include only documents modified on or after this date

props.name: modified_to
props.description: Include only documents modified before this date

props.name: deleted
props.description: Return only deleted documents

props.name: count
props.description: Number of documents to return (default: 50, max: 100)

props.name: page
props.description: Page number for pagination (starts with 1)

props.name: order_by
props.description: Sort results by field

props.name: metadata
props.description: Filter by metadata key-value pairs. Use format: {"key": "value"}

getDocumentAttachments.description: Retrieves details of a specific attachment from a document.

documentCompleted.description: Triggers when a document is completed.

props.name: template_filter
props.description: Only trigger for documents created from specific templates (leave empty for all)

props.name: folder_filter
props.description: Only trigger for documents in specific folders (leave empty for all)

documentStateChanged.description: Triggers when a document status changes.

props.name: filter_status
props.description: Only trigger for specific status changes (leave empty for all)

documentUpdated.description: Triggers when a document is updated.

props.name: template_filter
props.description: Only trigger for documents created from specific templates (leave empty for all)

props.name: folder_filter
props.description: Only trigger for documents in specific folders (leave empty for all)

props.name: update_type_filter
props.description: Only trigger for specific types of updates (leave empty for all)
